definition: the way something is with respect to its main attributes, put before
details:
noun
- the way something is with respect to its main attributes
= example: the way something is with respect to its main attributes
- a politically organized body of people under a single government
= example: a politically organized body of people under a single government
= synonyms: land, nation, country, commonwealth, res publica, body politic
- the group of people comprising the government of a sovereign state
= example: the group of people comprising the government of a sovereign state
- the territory occupied by a nation
= synonyms: land, country
- the territory occupied by one of the constituent administrative districts of a nation
= example: the territory occupied by one of the constituent administrative districts of a nation
= synonyms: province
- a state of depression or agitation
= example: a state of depression or agitation
- (chemistry) the three traditional states of matter are solids (fixed shape and volume) and liquids (fixed volume and shaped by the container) and gases (filling the container)
= example: (chemistry) the three traditional states of matter are solids (fixed shape and volume) and liquids (fixed volume and shaped by the container) and gases (filling the container)
= synonyms: state of matter
verb
- put before
= synonyms: posit, submit, put forward
- express in words
= synonyms: say, tell
- indicate through a symbol, formula, etc.
= synonyms: express
